includedAssets.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
includedAssets.synopsis: The heroic ninja turtles emerge from the sewers to protect New York from the villainous Shredder. Hit action fun with Megan Fox and Will Arnett.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The heroic ninja turtles emerge from the sewers to protect New York from the villainous Shredder. Hit action fun with Megan Fox and Will Arnett.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The heroic ninja turtles emerge from the sewers to protect New York from the villainous Shredder. Hit action fun with Megan Fox and Will Arnett.

includedAssets.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles...
includedAssets.synopsis: The sewer-dwelling super team have got a lot on their plate in this action-packed sequel. Half of them have had enough of all the secrecy and fancy mixing it up with the New Yorkers they so regularly save, a fact which means there's tension in the ranks just as nemesis Shredder busts out of police custody and goes on the rampage. He's got no less than world domination in his sights, hooking up with the mighty Krang in a bid to destroy life as we know it. Megan Fox returns as April O'Neil and Arrow's Stephen Amell joins the fray as hockey-masked vigilante Casey Jones.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The sewer-dwelling super team are back battling bad guys when Shredder busts out of custody and teams up with the mighty Krang. Action comedy sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The sewer-dwelling super team have got a lot on their plate in this action-packed sequel. Half of them have had enough of all the secrecy and fancy mixing it up with the New Yorkers they so regularly save, a fact which means there's tension in the ranks just as nemesis Shredder busts out of police custody and goes on the rampage. He's got no less than world domination in his sights, hooking up with the mighty Krang in a bid to destroy life as we know it. Megan Fox returns as April O'Neil and Arrow's Stephen Amell joins the fray as hockey-masked vigilante Casey Jones.

includedAssets.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Four anthropomorphic mutant turtles, taught ninjitsu by their rat master, leave their sewer home to protect New York City from cataclysmic threats. Produced by Michael Bay and starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and William Fichtner.

includedIn.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
includedIn.synopsis: Four anthropomorphic mutant turtles, taught ninjitsu by their rat master, leave their sewer home to protect New York City from cataclysmic threats, including deadly criminal mastermind Shredder and interdimensional conqueror Krang.
